scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @single-page-markdown-website/frontend && lerna run build --scope single-page-markdown-website
scripts.clean: lerna run --parallel clean && yarn run website-clean && rimraf '*.log'
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.website-build: yarn run website-clean && yarn run build && yarn run docs && ts-node --project tsconfig.shared.json packages/single-page-markdown-website/src/cli.ts README.md

single-page-markdown-website.title: Single-Page Markdown Website
single-page-markdown-website.description: Create a nice single-page documentation website from one or more Markdown files
